item.title: By: K
item.dc:creator: K
item.description: I believe I was in fact in attendance at the Tabernacle show. I also saw them in Santa Barbara one summer and I think in San Francisco, too. I also caught several shows in ATL, including twice at the old Cotton Club and once at Masquerade in ATL (circa '94?). They do indeed put on an amazing show. I've just never caught them with 50,000 in attendance.
item.content:encoded: I believe I was in fact in attendance at the Tabernacle show. I also saw them in Santa Barbara one summer and I think in San Francisco, too. I also caught several shows in ATL, including twice at the old Cotton Club and once at Masquerade in ATL (circa ’94?). They do indeed put on an amazing show. I’ve just never caught them with 50,000 in attendance.

item.title: By: bigcitysheep
item.dc:creator: bigcitysheep
item.description: Where have you seen them? They (sans Graham) put on an amazing show at the Tabernacle a few years back.
item.content:encoded: Where have you seen them? They (sans Graham) put on an amazing show at the Tabernacle a few years back.
